column3: Attitudes of Professors and Students as it relates to use of Open Education Resources (OER) Poster
column8: IRB-approved research on how attitudes of professors and students influence the use of open education resources (OER) in a college setting—attempts to further the discourse on affordable, personalized education for students to help deepen their knowledge on course content.
column9: Required in-depth knowledge of the literary discourse, an understanding of the statistical tests appropriate for the research, and detail-orientation for recruitment and submitting to IRB.
column10: Required an effective media campaign for recruiting participants through various outlets like social media, email, and physical posters.
